page.title: 03Vandalism _ Leeswood area
page.content: Vandalism is not a serious problem in this area.The damage is mainly caused by a minority of youths of the community. During the evenings the youths congregate in the bus shelters and sometimes are guilty of scrawling and spraying graffiti in both Welsh and English. There are youth clubs in Leeswood and Treuddyn but they are open only two nights a week.The youths complain of boredom and a lack of facilities. Our local constable would like to stamp out vandalism.Maintaining Law and Order in this area is relatively easy.
